name: Humble Squick
description:
This game was created during the Game-Jam 06/11/2021 of ETPA (French game design school) by the team "Ok Tier", team named like this because it contains only proud members with honest skills.

The theme of the Game-Jam was to make a game where communication should not be done by words or sounds.

So the Ok Tier team had the idea to create a genetically modified mouse (player 1) by a scientist (player 2), capable of communicating by signs. The mouse is put in a parkour where it must try to communicate only by signs with the scientist, who must press buttons to allow the mouse to progress in the level.

The isn't finished, we had lots of issues on the second day.. And we are sad.
